mainContent.heading: What is the Newsletter Form Section?
paragraphs: The Newsletter Form section allows you to add a dedicated email signup form to your Shopify store in a clean and structured layout.
It is designed to help store owners grow their subscriber list while keeping the design simple, clear, and aligned with their brand style.
This section works well for announcements, promotions, or ongoing communication, without distracting customers from the main shopping experience.
